name: The Lab Dog
description:
In the year 2032, in an abandoned lab, "Focal Sciences",  many test subjects and experiments are suspended. However, a dog breaks out of his coma and it's the time for him to make his way through a lot of failed experiments. Will he be able to escape the lab?

This game was rushed so there are currently no music tracks as of now.

Controls:

WASD to move the dog

Arrow Keys to move the box

R to reload the level
